snippet: The federal government appears to have been secretly tapping the largest Internet companies for nearly six years, according to documents that emerged on Thursday.

byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and EDWARD WYATT

lead_paragraph: The federal government appears to have been secretly tapping the largest Internet companies for nearly six years, according to documents that emerged on Thursday.

headline.main: N.S.A. Said to Have Collected Data From Internet Firms
